    • Method Detail

      • getAllCustomers

        public static javafx.collections.ObservableList<Customer> getAllCustomers()
                                                                   throws java.sql.SQLException,
                                                                          java.lang.Exception
        This is the method to create an ObservableList to get all customers. This method executes an SQL query to find all customers and then adds the customers to the ObservableList allCustomers.
        Returns:
        the ObservableList allCustomers
        Throws:
        java.sql.SQLException
        java.lang.Exception

      • addCustomer

        public static void addCustomer​(java.lang.String customerName,
                               java.lang.String customerAddress,
                               java.lang.String postalCode,
                               java.lang.String customerPhone,
                               java.sql.Timestamp createDate,
                               java.lang.String createdBy,
                               java.sql.Timestamp lastUpdate,
                               java.lang.String lastUpdateBy,
                               int Division_ID)
        This is the method to add a customer. The method executes an SQL query to insert a new Customer into the Customers table of the database using the data inputted on the CustomersAdd screen.
        Parameters:
        customerName - the name of the customer to add
        customerAddress - the address of the customer to add
        postalCode - the postal code of the customer to add
        customerPhone - the phone number of the customer to add
        createDate - the create date of the customer to add
        createdBy - the user creating the customer to add
        lastUpdate - the last updated time of the customer to add
        lastUpdateBy - the last user to update the customer to add
        Division_ID - the division ID of the customer to add

      • modifyCustomer

        public static void modifyCustomer​(int customerID,
                                  java.lang.String customerName,
                                  java.lang.String customerAddress,
                                  java.lang.String postalCode,
                                  java.lang.String customerPhone,
                                  java.sql.Timestamp lastUpdate,
                                  java.lang.String lastUpdateBy,
                                  int Division_ID)
        This is the method to modify a Customer. The method executes an SQL query to update an existing Customer in the Customers table of the database using the data inputted on the CustomersModify screen.
        Parameters:
        customerID - the ID of the customer to modify
        customerName - the name of the customer to modify
        customerAddress - the address of the customer to modify
        postalCode - the postal code of the customer to modify
        customerPhone - the phone number of the customer to modify
        lastUpdate - the last updated time of the customer to modify
        lastUpdateBy - the last user to update the customer to modify
        Division_ID - the division ID of the customer to modify

      • deleteCustomer

        public static void deleteCustomer​(int customerID)
        This is the method to delete a customer. The method executes an SQL query to delete an existing Customer in the Customers table of the database with the selected Customer ID.
        Parameters:
        customerID - the ID of the customer to delete

      • getCustomerFromCustomerID

        public static Customer getCustomerFromCustomerID​(int customerID)
                                          throws java.sql.SQLException
        This is the method to get a Customer object from a Customer ID. The method executes an SQL query to select the customer from the Customers table with the selected Customer ID.
        Parameters:
        customerID - the customer ID to get the customer object for
        Returns:
        the Customer getCustomerFromCustomerIDResult
        Throws:
        java.sql.SQLException

      • countCustomers

        public static int countCustomers​(int Country_ID)
                          throws java.sql.SQLException
        This is the method to count the number of customers with the selected Country ID. The method executes an SQL query to count the numbers of customers where the Division ID is found by using the selected Country ID and then matching the Country ID to its range of FirstLevelDivision IDs.
        Parameters:
        Country_ID - the country ID of which to count customers for
        Returns:
        the number of customers with the selected Country ID
        Throws:
        java.sql.SQLException
